reviewText: Amazing!  I had no idea how many ways streamers can be used to enhance and beautify dance.  Learn several creative and fun movements whether you choose to use small or large streamers, and a complete dance.  The sky is the limit!
An great ressource to practice and develop new skills with streamers with your worship dance team. You will learn a complete step by step choreography.

Have you ever wondered what brand new things that you could do with your ministry's streamers?  Wonder no more!  Let it flow is packed with creative ideas and concepts!  This video is so much fun!  Purchase and let the ideas flow!
Let it flow, let it flow, let it flow; let your creative juices flow as you watch this flowing video. I know I learned a lot about how to move and use streamers for Gods glory. I hope you will too!

This video is jammed packed with choreography ideas incorporating streaming. This video demonstrates how adding a simple streamer can enhance a dance. Also, adding a streaming can make a dance more exciting and visually pleasing to the eye, as it used as an extension of the body.

This DVD is full of great creative ideas for ministry dances to glorify the Lord and I am excited to have this as another useful prop to use in expressing the Father's Heart to His people.  It is so beautiful and gives another avenue of deeper ministry.  And I love the bonus dance at the end that Pastor Lynn teaches to be used in ministry.  It is a must have DVD.

I Love This Video! It Provides An Excellent Teaching On Creative Ways To Incorporate Streamers Into Your Ministry Presentation. The DVD Highlights, Both Solo & Group Movements, That Are Not Only Easy To Learn, But Also Fun To Watch. In Addition, The DVD Also Provides You With A Chance To Learn One Of Pastor Lynn's Signature Choreographed Dances! You Will Be Blessed!
